reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, soft, and perfect in fit, with one mentioning the adjustable waist ties. The dress receives positive feedback for its appearance, color, and quality. The fabric quality and sizing receive mixed reviews - while some say the fabric is good quality, one notes it's very thick, and while some find the medium size perfect, others say it runs small.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress
items.body: Material soft like bamboo- flattering, comfy, just right! Fit well, great quality material and color. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looked great. Seam fell apart.
items.body: The dress looked great and fit well. The issue is after about 4hrs the seam fell apart holding the skirt to the top. Luckily, I had a wide belt that I was able to hide it till we got back to our room. The dress is very stretchy and forgiving on the top with pockets. I am a 38H and had no issues. I sent back due to the defect. Would purchase again. Read more
items.author: ShananD

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Off white plus size dress
items.body: Wore this for my courthouse wedding and loved it. Fabric is good quality, a bit see through, a little long (i'm 5'2) but overall I loved it, it's flowey and comfortable. True to size, color is an eggshell ivory. Beautiful dress. Read more
items.author: daniela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dressy and comfortable
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised how comfortable this dress feels. It looks nice and I didn't feel like I needed to change out of it right away. I'm all about comfort and would recommend it to others. I dressed it up with gold shoes and jewelry. Read more
items.author: Shellynurse

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit!
items.body: Perfect fit! Very true to size. I love the way it flowed and the length was perfect. I am 5’2 156 lbs. Read more
items.author: Alicia Lefebvre

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Nothing
items.body: Appears to be cheaply made Read more
items.author: nadine goeller

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too thick
items.body: The fabric of this dress is very thick and you can tell will be hot and maybe stinky. Read more
items.author: Kris Murray

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress for layering
items.body: Pretty color. Comes to ankles on my petite frame. I don’t like this dress by itself - something about the tight top and waistband. I’ll layer it with a cropped sweater or waist length blouse - looks fab. Add some tights and boots for winter. The brown is pretty. It’s soft and a bit stretchy. Nice flowy skirt. Read more
items.author: Karen Taggesell

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Darkgreen, Brown, Navy, Pink, Sand, White, Burgundy, Light Green, Black, Dusty Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
